subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Petr Prucha had two goals and an assist Monday night and his linemates, Matt Cullen and Jed Ortmeyer, also had 3 points in the Rangers’ 6-1 victory over the Bruins in Boston.
snippet: Petr Prucha had two goals and an assist Monday night and his linemates, Matt Cullen and Jed Ortmeyer, also had 3 points in the Rangers’ 6-1 victory over the Bruins in Boston.
